name: Ext_R3_AdverseEvent_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.AdverseEvent.subject for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents AdverseEvent.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AdverseEvent|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Subject or group impacted by event
element.definition: This subject or group impacted by the event.  With a prospective adverse event, there will be no subject as the adverse event was prevented.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.subject` maps to R4 `AdverseEvent.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.

element.short: Subject or group impacted by event
element.definition: This subject or group impacted by the event.  With a prospective adverse event, there will be no subject as the adverse event was prevented.
element.comment: `AdverseEvent.subject` maps to R4 `AdverseEvent.subject`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ResearchSubject)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Medication)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Device)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.
